caption.title: Future species distribution models of CAS on global scale under different climate scenarios predicted by MaxEnt.
caption.p: Gray, unsuitable habitat area; blue, low habitat suitability area; green, moderate habitat suitability area; red, highly habitat suitability area. The base map was created with Natural Earth Dataset ( http://www.naturalearthdata.com/). (A) RCP 2050-2.6; (B) RCP 2070-2.6; (C) RCP 2050-8.5; (D) RCP 2070-8.5.
